title: Why do I still feel lonely even though I’m hanging out with my best friend, I recently have been dumped and that’s the only thing on my mind right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, because you were being made fun of by some people whom they are mean. That is bullying. Even though you are still hanging out with your best friend, you are still a nice guy. Every year, bullying has happened when anything is happened. You have been targeted by mean people. You should look up the articles about bullying.
